subject: RE: [junit] testing void methods
msgSnippet: Hi, abhishek: You can read the faq of JUnit to resolve this issue. The web address is http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#tests_4 Best wishes, Shaq
messageBody:
Hi, abhishek:

You can read the faq of JUnit to resolve this issue.
The web address is http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#tests_4

Best wishes,
Shaq

> -----邮件原件-----
> 发件人: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] 代表 abhishek
> sao
> 发送时间: 2005年12月8日 17:54
> 收件人: junit@yahoogroups.com
> 主题: [junit] testing void methods
>
> Hi all,
>
> I have just started using junit. I need to know that is there any way by
which
> i can test a void method? The only test cases I have written till now were
for
> methods that returned some methods and i used to check the value using
> assertequals(). But how do I do it for a void function.
>
> Somebody, please help me...
>
